Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Generative AI was good at correcting errors and improving the flow of text, however teacher's feedback was far more impactful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from AI feels somewhat inauthentic as it tries to please you by not trying to criticise too harshly.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Generative AI does not have the same level of understanding of the subject and assessment requirements as a teacher does.
